items.name: Zenith Art Gallery & Studio
items.short_description: A vibrant hub showcasing contemporary Nigerian art, featuring rotating exhibitions, interactive workshops, and artist meet-and-greets. It's a fresh take on Enugu's art scene.

items.name: Harmony Hills Eco-Park
items.short_description: Escape to nature at this serene eco-park offering well-maintained hiking trails, tranquil picnic spots, and opportunities for birdwatching. A perfect green lung for the city.

items.name: The Coal City Food Hub
items.short_description: A bustling culinary destination featuring diverse local and international street food vendors, gourmet stalls, and regular live music events. Taste the world in Enugu!

items.name: Innovate Enugu Centre
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art tech hub and co-working space designed to foster innovation, offering modern facilities, tech labs, and a calendar of entrepreneurial workshops.

items.name: Safari Adventure Park Enugu
items.short_description: An exhilarating family-friendly adventure park featuring zip lines, challenging obstacle courses, and a dedicated, safe play area for younger children. Thrills for all ages!

items.name: The Anthill Suites & Lounge
items.short_description: A stylish new boutique hotel renowned for its sophisticated rooftop lounge, offering panoramic city views and a chic ambiance perfect for evening relaxation. Public access to lounge.

items.name: Enugu Storytelling Hub
items.short_description: An interactive cultural center dedicated to preserving and sharing Enugu's rich history and vibrant traditions through engaging exhibitions, performances, and guided heritage walks.

items.name: Artisan's Village Enugu
items.short_description: A dynamic community market showcasing the incredible talent of local artisans, featuring handmade crafts, traditional Nigerian textiles, and live craft demonstrations. Discover unique souvenirs.

items.name: The Sapphire Eatery
items.short_description: An upscale fine dining restaurant offering an exquisite fusion of Nigerian and continental cuisine in a sleek, contemporary setting. Perfect for special occasions and gourmet experiences.
items.address: Polo Park Mall Complex, Ebeano Tunnel

items.name: FunZone Arcade & Bowling
items.short_description: Enugu's newest indoor entertainment complex, featuring state-of-the-art arcade games, professional bowling lanes, and a lively soft-play area for younger children. Endless family fun.
